titles.title: He Has Called Us To A Quiet Place

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He has called us to a quiet place,
Separated from the rest of the world.
He has called us to a silent place,
Where all other voices are stilled.
He has called us to a peaceful place,
And there on bended knee,
We will sit at the feet of Jesus,
And say, O Lord, teach me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Teach me those things which have been hidden
Since the beginning of the world.
Teach me those things which mankind has longed
To know and yet has never seen.
Teach me those things which are Thy nature.
Teach me those things which are Thy way.
And draw me Lord, draw me unto Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
A un lugar secreto no llamó, separados del mundo veloz.
A un lugar apacible nos llamó, donde no se oye otra voz.
A un lugar callado nos llamó, y allí arrodillados,
Nos sentaremos a los pies de Cristo,
Y diremos: enséñanos.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Enséñanos las cosas escondidas
Desde que todo comenzó.
Enséñanos las cosas que el hombre anhela saber,
Más nunca aprendió,
Enséñame la naturaleza tuya,
Enséñame tambien Tu voluntad,
Y atráeme, atráeme a Ti.
